Uses of Package
TowerDefense

  • Classes in TowerDefense used by TowerDefense 
    Class and Description
    AnimationData
    Contains all of the data required for the engine to use an animation.
    Barricade
    Barricades are objects that stand on the path to the end goal.
    Character
    Characters are GameObjects that represent living beings.
    Destructible
    Destructibles are GameObjects that can be destroyed.
    Direction
    Simple little enum that represents four directions.
    GameObjectPlus
    This class simply extends GameObject with some additional functionality.
    Path
    Paths are a spawn location followed by a series of Waypoints that ultimately lead to a final destination.
    Projectile
    A projectile is an object that is thrown by a Character.
    SetOfWalkers
    A whole list of Walkers, and some interfaces to easily interact with them.
    Smoke.MovementPhase 
    StatusBar
    Status bars were used in the menu to display Towers' health and badFeels.
    Tile
    A tile is a rectangular area representing terrain on a 2-dimensional grid.
    Tower
    Towers are meant to sit somewhere and shoot things in various ways.
    Tower.Type 
    Walker
    Walkers are the characters that move along the path.
    Walker.Type 
    Wave
    A Wave is a series of Walkers that appears at a set rate during a level.
    Waypoint
    Waypoints are locations on the grid, and can be used to create a path.
